etymology.description: Depicts a bag or container with a bottom, possibly indicating a sack or pouch shape.
etymology.interpretation: The character visually represents a bag with an emphasis on its bottom, conveying the concept of a completed, functional container.

examples.chinese: 这个𣒚很结实(這個𣒚很結實)，可以装很多东西(可以裝很多東西)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè ge tuó hěn jiéshí, kěyǐ zhuāng hěn duō dōngxī.
examples.english: This bag with a bottom is very sturdy, and it can hold many things.
I use the bag with a bottom to store rice.
